doc:
Edward Cooper (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Edward_Cooper_(actor) 0 Edward Cooper (28 June 1883 – 15 July 1956) was an English actor who worked extensively in both Britain and Hollywood. Cooper generally played minor or supporting parts but was occasionally given larger roles. He was married for 39 years to the actress Ethel Griffies. Edward_Cooper ( 28_June_1883 – 15_July_1956 ) was an_English_actor who worked extensively in both_Britain_and_Hollywood . Cooper generally played minor_or_supporting_parts but was_occasionally_given larger_roles . He was_married for 39_years to the_actress_Ethel_Griffies .
